title: VL-Rethinker: Incentivizing Self-Reflection of Vision-Language Models with Reinforcement Learning
details: H Wang, C Qu, Z Huang, W Chu, F Lin, W Chen - arXiv preprint arXiv:2504.08837, 2025
abstract: Recently, slow-thinking systems like GPT-o1 and DeepSeek-R1 have demonstrated great potential in solving challenging problems through explicit reflection. They significantly outperform the best fast-thinking models, such as GPT-4o, on various …
